targets.legendFormat: Instance: {{instance}}, Protocol: {{protocol}}, Method: {{http_method}}, URL: {{http_url}}, Quantile: {"0.99"}, Service:{{service}}

targets.expr: sum( max_over_time({__name__=~".*HttpClient_requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", peer_address=~"$peer_address", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m]) - min_over_time({__name__=~".*HttpClient_requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", peer_address=~"$peer_address", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m]) )

sum( max_over_time(ballerina_http_HttpClient_4XX_requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m]) - min_over_time(ballerina_http_HttpClient_4XX_requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m])+ max_over_time(ballerina_http_HttpClient_5XX_requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m]) - min_over_time(ballerina_http_HttpClient_5XX_requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m]) )

sum( max_over_time(ballerina_http_HttpClient_4XX_requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m]) - min_over_time(ballerina_http_HttpClient_4XX_requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m])+ max_over_time(ballerina_http_HttpClient_5XX_requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m]) - min_over_time(ballerina_http_HttpClient_5XX_requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m]))*100/sum( max_over_time(ballerina_http_HttpClient_requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m]) - min_over_time(ballerina_http_HttpClient_requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", action=~"$http_client_action", http_url!="/metrics"}[1m]))
